description: Data was loaded from the Illumina file HumanMethylation450_15017482_v.1.2.csv in June 2015, and updated in April 2017. DNA methylation platform annotation information was made available to the public with permission from Illumina.

fields.description: Example:14622465
fields.name: AddressA_ID

fields.description: Example:41635319
fields.name: AddressB_ID

fields.description: Example: TAACTAAAAAACAACAATACTAACTCTACACTAAATACCCACTAACCCTC
fields.name: AlleleA_ProbeSeq

fields.description: Example: TAACTAAAAAACAACAATACTAACTCTACACTAAATACCCACTAACCCTT
fields.name: AlleleB_ProbeSeq

fields.description: Chromosome - genome build 37. Examples: 1, 2, ..., 22, X, Y (or null)
fields.name: CHR

fields.description: Chromosome - genome build 36. Examples: 1, 2, ..., 22, X, Y, MULTI (or null)
fields.name: Chromosome_36

fields.description: Color of the incorporated base (Red or Green) - Infinium I assays only. Either Red or Grn (or null)
fields.name: Color_Channel

fields.description: Coordinates(chromosome) - genome build 36. Examples: 1, 2, MULTI, 22 (or null)
fields.name: Coordinate_36

fields.description: DNAse hypersensitive site (experimentally determined). Either FALSE orTRUE
fields.name: DHS

fields.description: Differentially methylated region (experimentally determined). Examples:DMR,CDMR,or RDMR
fields.name: DMR

fields.description: Enhancer element (informatically-determined). Either FALSE or TRUE
fields.name: Enhancer

fields.description: Base sequence (in 5 prime -3 prime orientation) flanking query site.
fields.name: Forward_Sequence

fields.description: Genome build on which forward sequence is based. Examples: 36, 37, or null
fields.name: Genome_Build

fields.description: Hidden Markov Model Island.Example: Y:21327301-21327921
fields.name: HMM_Island

fields.description: Unique CpG locus identifier from the Illumina CG database.Example: rs10796216
fields.name: IlmnID

fields.description: Defines Assay type - Infinium I or Infinium II. Either I or II.
fields.name: Infinium_Design_Type

fields.description: Coordinates - genome build 37.Example: 26627454
fields.name: MAPINFO

fields.description: Present or absent on HumanMethylation27 array. Either TRUE or FALSE
fields.name: Methyl27_Loci

fields.description: Unique CpG locus identifier from the Illumina CG database.Example: rs10796216
fields.name: Name

fields.description: Base added at SBE step - Infinium I assays only.Either A, C, T, or null
fields.name: Next_Base

fields.description: FANTOM-derived promoter. Example: high-CpG:287077-288261
fields.name: Phantom

fields.description: Assays with SNPs present within probe >10bp from query site. Example: rs2562205
fields.name: Probe_SNPs

fields.description: Assays with SNPs present within probe ?10bp from query site (HM27 carryover or recently discovered). Example: rs74703363
fields.name: Probe_SNPs_10

fields.description: Whether loci were chosen randomly in the design process. Either TRUE or FALSE
fields.name: Random_Loci

fields.description: Regulatory feature category. Examples: Promoter_Associated, Gene_Associated, Gene_Associated_Cell_type_specific, Unclassified_Cell_type_specific, NonGene_Associated, Unclassified, Promoter_Associated_Cell_type_specific
fields.name: Regulatory_Feature_Group

fields.description: Regulatory feature (informatically determined). Example: 7:148904-150565
fields.name: Regulatory_Feature_Name

fields.description: Relationship to Canonical CpG Island: Shores - 0-2 kb from CpG island; Shelves - 2-4 kb from CpG island. Examples: Island, S_Shore, N_Shelf, N_Shore, S_Shelf (or null)
fields.name: Relation_to_UCSC_CpG_Island

fields.description: Unconverted design sequence. Example: AGGGATGACGGCGCCTCTTGCGTAGGTCCTGAGGAGACGGCTCGGCTCCG
fields.name: SourceSeq

fields.description: Design Strand. Either R, F, or null
fields.name: Strand

fields.description: CpG island name (UCSC). Example: chr7:31003-31442
fields.name: UCSC_CpG_Islands_Name

fields.description: UCSCis a field of type RECORD, mode REPEATED. Each of the possibly multiple records in this field hasthree components: UCSC.RefGene_Group, UCSC.RefGene_Accession, UCSC.RefGene_Name. Example of the contents of one record: UCSC.RefGene_Group = Body, UCSC.RefGene_Accession = NM_033023, UCSC.RefGene_Name = PDGFA
Gene region feature category (UCSC)
fields.name: RefGene_Group

fields.description: Accession number (UCSC)
fields.name: RefGene_Accession

fields.description: Gene name (UCSC)
fields.name: RefGene_Name
UCSC
